divneet_khokhar: OMG this is exactly my story from two years ago. Except that I had an unnamed shoulder issue ( probably fibromyalgia) and you had it in the form of slip disc.. the pain just doesn’t stop by going to doctors, neurologist or chiropractor. I still remember after my therapy sessions how light and comforting I used to feel, as if no pain every existed in my body. They say 98% physical problems are psychosomatic.. I am glad you are better Cz my problem is recurring, specially with what’s happening around the world, it’s a painful time for me. Hope you see light at the end of this all.. love and peace to you 🤗
